description: Towards the end of the Broad Cove Banks Rd, where your car may have bottomed out a few times ,lies a place called Port Ban cove on the topo maps but the local call it Magic cove.I parked by the edge of a field where a sign indicated not to drive unto it.  There was an evident path leading to the cove.  A short walk of no more than a few minutes led me down to the brook which flowed into the cove via a small 8ft waterfall.   The wind was howling on the day I was there and I couldn?t make my way to the cove to the right of the waterfall.
directions: Inverness, Cape Breton Island.  Turn on Broad cove Banks Rd and continue for about 15-20min until the pull off area at N46.19173° W61.41306°.  The fall is at ; N46.19309° W61.41214°
title: Magic Cove Fall
